name: The Business of Gambling
description:
The end goal is to finally make 1 MILLION DOLLARS and be set for life. Guide him as he works to bring in the cash and make questionable life choices. You get to choose how he reaches the top and whether or not he finds success or failure...

Either steadily make money or slither your way higher through gambling your savings.

CREDITS:

Coding: plackett

(Most)Art and Animations: PremedLynx
Assets Used:

Funiculi Funicula by Luigi Denza

MuseNet AI for the music

JMH Cthulhumbus Arcade Font used throughout the game

TextMeshPro and other Unity Assets such as LetterBoxer and LeanTween

MADE FOR THE GMTK GAME JAM 2022!
